import { useState, useRef, useEffect } from 'react' import autoAnimate from '@formkit/auto-animate' import { Link } from 'react-router-dom' const Collapsible = () => { const [show, setShow] = useState() const parent = useRef(null) const [isOpen, setIsOpen] = useState(false) useEffect(() => { parent.current && autoAnimate(parent.current) }, [parent]) const reveal = () => setShow(!show) return
{isOpen ? 'CLOSE' : 'MENU'} {show &&
